TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ObjectManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 在对象进行反序列化时对其进行跟踪。

span.span: Keeps track of objects as they are deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间查询以确定是否对的序列化流中的某个对象的引用是指已被反序列化的对象 （后向引用），或尚未对象反序列化 （前向引用）。During deserialization, the queries the to determine whether a reference to an object in the serialized stream refers to an object that has already been deserialized (a backward reference), or to an object that has not yet been deserialized (a forward reference). 如果序列化流中的引用是前向引用，则可以注册与修正。If the reference in the serialized stream is a forward reference, then the can register a fixup with the . 如果序列化流中的引用为向后引用，立即完成该引用。If the reference in the serialized stream is a backward reference, the immediately completes the reference. 修正是指完成在对象反序列化过程尚未完成的对象引用的过程。Fixup refers to the process of finalizing object references not already completed during the object deserialization process. 所需的对象已反序列化后，将完整的参考。After the required object has been deserialized, the will complete the reference. 遵循一组规则，规定修正的顺序。The follows a set of rules that dictate the fixup order. 实现的所有对象或具有可以预计有通过它们传输的所有对象对象树反序列化时可用。All objects that implement or have a can expect to have all the objects that they transmitted through available when the object tree is deserialized. 但是，父对象不能假设，所有子对象将被完全都完成完全反序列化时。However, a parent object cannot presume that all its child objects will be fully completed when it is fully deserialized. 所有子对象将都会显示，但并非所有孙级对象一定都会存在。All child objects will be present but not all the grandchild objects will necessarily be present. 如果对象需要执行某些操作，取决于在子对象上执行代码，它可以延迟这些操作，实现接口，并且仅在此接口上调用返回时执行代码。If an object needs to take certain actions that depend on executing code on its child objects, it can delay these actions, implement the interface, and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来遍历对象图，一次遍历到每个对象。The following code example shows how to use the class to walk through an object graph, traversing to each object only once. [!code-csharp[ObjectManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/ObjectManager/CS/ObjectManager.cs#1)]

span.span: Performs all the recorded fixups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修正会执行任何适当的代理项，对象本身 (如果它实现)，或默认实现。The fixups are carried out by any appropriate surrogate, the object itself (if it implements ), or the default implementation.

span.span: A fixup was not successfully completed.

span.span: Registers an object as it is deserialized, associating it with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将保留信息有关对象和其 id。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 以后在反序列化期间可以用于确定是否已将特定的对象 ID 进行反序列化，或是否它是对尚未反的对象的前向引用。Later during deserialization, can be used to determine whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object that has not yet been deserialized.

summary.span: 在对象成员反序列化时注册该对象成员，同时将其与 相关联并记录 。

span.span: Registers a member of an object as it is deserialized, associating it with , and recording the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你需要提供`member`和`idOfContainingObj`参数如果`obj`是由于的方法执行修正对象。You need to provide the `member` and `idOfContainingObj` parameters if `obj` is a because of the way fixups are performed on objects. 要存储的信息的空间分配内联使用其包含的对象。The space to store the information for a is allocated inline with its containing object. 但是，当装箱要注册与，它将失去与其包含的对象的连接。However, when the is boxed to be registered with the , it loses the connection with its containing object. 若要确保修正的实例中出现存储中包含的对象，不能在已装箱的实例，保留一些额外信息。To guarantee that fixups occur in the instance of the stored in the containing object and not in the boxed instance, the retains some additional information. 将保留信息有关对象和其 id。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 以后在反序列化期间可以用于发现是否已将特定的对象 ID 进行反序列化，或它是否对对象的前向引用不尚未反序列化。Later during deserialization, can be used to discover whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object not yet deserialized.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

span.span: The has already been registered for an object other than , or is not a and is not .
